original: HESSELMAN, Knut Jonas Elias, Direktör, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Sthlm 9/4 77 av fabrikör B A H o Marie Louise Åberg, gm Anna Strandell (d). Ex KTH 99. Rit v AB Diesels Motorer 00, konstr.ch o l:e ing 01— 11, övering 12—17, start eg konstr- o experi-mentverkst 18, bild Hesselmans Patent AB 25, vkst dir där. Styr.led i sistn bol sed. start, i AB Hema 30—41, i Hesselman Motor Corp 31—41. Konstr dieselmotorer f öl ändamål 01 —17, utexperimenterat syst f dir insprutn av bränsle i dieselmotorer 18—22, oljemotorer m låg kompression o elektr tändn 26—29 (Hesselmans lågtrycksmotor), inneh ett 100-tal pat betr motorer. RVO, LIVA (dess st GM), LVA, K AK: s gplak.
translated: HESSELMAN, Knut Jonas Elias, Director, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, b. Stockholm 9/4 1877, son of manufacturer B A H and Marie Louise Åberg, m. Anna Strandell (deceased). Former student at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) 1899. Draftsman at AB Diesels Motorer 1900, design engineer and first engineer 1901-1911, chief engineer 1912-1917, started own design and experimental workshop in 1918, established Hesselmans Patent AB in 1925, served as managing director there. Board member of the company since its establishment. Also board member in AB Hema 1930-1941 and Hesselman Motor Corp 1931-1941. Designed diesel engines for various purposes 1901-1917, conducted experiments on direct fuel injection in diesel engines 1918-1922, worked on low compression oil engines and electric ignition 1926-1929 (Hesselmans low-pressure engine), held around 100 patents related to engines. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO), Member of the Swedish Inventors Association (LIVA, its grand master), Member of the Swedish Engineers Association (LVA), Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences (K AK).
